page.title: 15Transport (continued)
page.content: Sinclair C5 It costs lp for the battery to bs charged. The vehicle cost Â£299. They are driven along by a washing machine motor. It is made from fibreglass. You need to be fourteen years old to drive one. When they first came out they were Â£400 so they have gone down rapidly as no one was buying because of the cost. They were also too small as the traffic could not see the C5. Safety Safety in transport is very important nowadays as most deaths are caused by road accidents, crossing the road is made easier by pelican and zebra crossings. A bridge or subway are useful for major roads or motorways and all bridges have safety rails. Before cars or any other vehicle can be put on the road they have to go through tough and difficult test.
